name: The 3rd International Conference on Public health and Well-being 2021 (Public Health 2021)
content: The 3rd International Conference on Public health and Well-being 2021 invites you to submit your research papers and case studies on or before 1st September 2021 to present online. The conference theme is “Current Public Health Practices: Building resilience and well-being.” The following are the conference tracks for abstract submission. Migration & Public Health Chronic diseases Alcohol and drugs Reproductive health Disease prevention and control Public health and human rights Health Informatics Global Health and Population Social and Behavioral Sciences and health education Healthcare Management Environmental Health Nutrition and Health Health policy Epidemiology Mental health Public Health Technology Child and adolescent Health Biostatistics and bioinformatics Immunology and Infectious Diseases Please click this link for more information https://publichealthconferences.com/call-for-papers/
